title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1040.6 - Littering and dumping rubbish and refuse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1040.6 - Littering and dumping rubbish and refuse

State Regulations

No person shall litter in a facility or train. All persons
shall use receptacles provided for the disposal of refuse. No bulk refuse
generated or collected on property outside the jurisdiction of SIRTOA may be
taken into, dumped within or carried through a facility or train or deposited
in any facility or train receptacle. Trash and other waste materials contained
in waste receptacles within a facility or train shall not be removed except by
persons duly authorized to do so. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1040.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
